content:
You have a list of intents and slots associated with those intents.  You should read the utterance you'll be provided and define the best intent that it matches. You can choose only one intent. Also, extract all relevant slots and their values. 
All intents are provided in json format.  Each intent has its Intent Id in a alphanumeric format, intent name and description. Each slot has slot Id, slot.name and slot description, and data type.
It may also include a field of possible .values which means the slot must match one of the provided values. It could also include a field exampleValues where examples are given but the extracted slots do not need to exactly match those given values.  If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.  If a value of slot is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none". 
I want you to give your final output as a JSON.  The JSON should always have a key “output”.  I want you to use Intent Id when answering. 


I want to report the issue I'm encountering with the scanner on the 3rd floor.  It's an Epson DS-30000. It's returning a message "Scanner Not found - check connection".
